 Test statements that return vectors

   [your name]
Initial variables:
   X <- c(1,2,3,4)
Checking code:
   5/5 complete. Good work! 😀
a: ✔ vector: 1 2 3 4
     Your code:
       t01 <- c(1, 2, 3, 4)
     Expected:
       t01 <- c(1, 2, 3, 4)
b: ✔ vector: 3.1 6.3 9.4 12.6 15.7 18.8 22 25.1 28.3 31.4 34.6 37.7 40.8 44 47.1
     Your code:
       t02 <- round(seq(1:15) * pi, 1)
     Expected:
       t02 <- round(seq(1:15) * pi, 1)
c: ✔ vector: 2 4 6 8
     Your code:
       t03 <- t01 * 2
     Expected:
       t03 <- t01 * 2 # A: c(2 4 6 8)
d: ✔ vector: 6 8
     Your code:
       t04 <- t03[t03 > 4]
     Expected:
       t04 <- t03[t03 > 4] # A: c(6 8)
e: ✔ vector: 2 4 6 8
     Your code:
       t05 <- X + t01
     Expected:
       t05 <- X + t01 # A: c(2,4,6,8)
